title: NEWZEALAND SERVERS PLEASE
body:
PLEASE CAN WE GET NEWZEALAND SERVERS 
THIS WOULD HELP MAJORLY AND PROMOTE YOUR GAME EVEN FURTHER TO THIS DEMOGRAPHIC

replies.body:
Hey there,

I haven't seen anyone from NZ complain about where the servers are located. Hell, we have players in Asian countries who experience no issues on OCE.

Are you experiencing problems with the OCE servers?
